amendment.description: At the end of the resolution, add the following: "SEC. 2. Upon the adoption of the conference report the House shall be considered to have adopted the concurrent resolution (H.Con.Res 191) directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2918.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that upon the adoption of the conference report the House shall be considered to have adopted the concurrent resolution (H.Con.Res. 191) directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2918.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
